text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah… haah.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Ah! Oh no! Umm… F-Fukukitaru? Everyone…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: S-Suzuka-san, you went too fast…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa… When you get lost in thought you end up running too far away from campus. At this rate, we might not make it back in time for school.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That would be a problem… Air Groove told me that if I'm late again because of this she'll ban me from doing early morning training sessions…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ahh, so that's why you asked us to be your lookouts, Senpai… That being said, I feel like we didn't do a good job of that…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: W-Well why don't we rehydrate and take a breather? Then we can turn around and head back to campus!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh, already? Okay…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Really…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hey now, you said it yourself didn't you!? If we keep pushing the vice-president's buttons, she'll give us such a frightening scolding that even monsters would run away in terror!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hey now… You shouldn't bad mouth your seniors. After all, if you don't do anything to upset them, they won't be angry.
Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello girls!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Bright!? Wait, how long have you been following us…!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I was preparing to go for a run when I noticed you three… So pretty much from the beginning ♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that so…!? Well why don't you join us for a run back to campus?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Your invitation brings me great pleasure ♪ However, I would prefer to follow you girls at my own pace, so please do not mind me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: After all, I'm known to be very carefree. So please feel free to go at whatever pace suits you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Okay. Well then, we'll be heading back now. Hey, Suzuka, Fukukitaru, let's go… I'll see you later, Bright!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: See you later ♪ Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: It seems as though the sakura blossoms are already beginning to bud… Perhaps those are winter sakura blossoms? Well, it may be faint, but it looks like spring is finally coming.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I guess in a sense… I'm just like them, merely a late bloomer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Until spring arrives, I'll continue to run in my lackadaisical manner ♪
Ha, haa, hah, haa—

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: We have reached the target distance… Let's take a break.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Phew… I love the early morning air! It's an amazing way to start off the day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Wait… Huh? Ayabe-san? Is there something wrong with my legs?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No… I was simply thinking that they were in as good a form as ever.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Thank you…!? E-Ehehe…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But that being said, you were taking the turns a bit too wide. You need to remember to keep your stride narrow…

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ugh… You're right. I know it's a problem, but I'm not good at actually fixing it…

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, but I'm grateful for your advice! Ayabe-san, your advice is very sincere, so I appreciate it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What's with you… I only said it because it would be problematic if you toppled over…

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Wait… huh? Ayabe-san, do you hear that? Is someone… singing…? For whatever reason, the voice sounds familiar…
Luu… Lalala… ♪

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Top Road-san… We need to leave.  Right now.

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, if it isn't you two!! The two bearers of my destiny!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: She's so fast…! But that's to be expected of you, O-Opera O-chan…!

text_block_list.name: Meishodoto
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san and Top Road-san! Would you two… Umm… Err… Planning on joining the… Uh… Morning Dew's… Triumphant Return?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What is that…?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa Hahaha! Doto, that was close but still incorrect! The correct title is "The Triumphant Return of the Supreme Ruler Under The Glimmer of the Morning Dew!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Umm… So in other words, you're going for an early morning run along the riverbed or something?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: You're really, really, really, really, really close, but not quite. Now then, don't be shy you two. Come and join my ranks!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, I would love to! Opera O-chan, Doto-chan, thank you for allowing me to join!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Hold on… Are you serious?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Of course! I'm positive I can learn to run better if I train on these rugged roads, and I can improve on what you pointed out to me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Not only that, I've always wanted to race against Opera O-chan and Doto-chan! And this is the perfect opportunity for that!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: That's the type of attitude that will help create the age of the Supreme Ruler. Now then, let us be off! Haa Hahahahaha!!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Ahh jeez…!!
